message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to get your hands on this amazing product. I'm willing to offer it to you for $11,500. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate you considering my budget.  I'm really interested in the product, but I can't go above $10,500.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway there?

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, but I'm still a bit above your offer. I'm willing to compromise and meet you halfway between my original offer and your counteroffer. I'm now willing to sell the product to you for $11,000. What do you think?
